title: Roll on rainbows with new Pi Rope colored fiber spokes, Lefty wheel & many more rim options!
content:
Pi Rope’s unique 2.2g Vectran fiber spokes add tons of new options, with many new wheel build in carbon or alloy rims, their first in-house-developed hubs, and of course, rainbow colors for their spokes and nipples. If you are looking to build a unique road, gravel, or mountain bike wheelset, it’s hard to argue that

The post Roll on rainbows with new Pi Rope colored fiber spokes, Lefty wheel & many more rim options! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
